switch.name: fuel/pump-left-on
switch.test: /controls/fuel/tank[0]/pump-aft EQ 1 propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs GT 0
/controls/fuel/tank[0]/pump-fwd EQ 1 propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs GT 0

switch.name: fuel/pump-right-on
switch.test: /controls/fuel/tank[1]/pump-aft EQ 1 propulsion/tank[1]/contents-lbs GT 0
/controls/fuel/tank[1]/pump-fwd EQ 1 propulsion/tank[1]/contents-lbs GT 0

switch.name: fuel/pump-left-center-on
switch.test: /controls/fuel/tank[2]/pump-left EQ 1 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GT 0

switch.name: fuel/pump-right-center-on
switch.test: /controls/fuel/tank[2]/pump-right EQ 1 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GT 0

switch.name: fuel/left-pipe-feed
switch.test: fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs GT 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs LT 0.25
/controls/fuel/tank[2]/pump-left EQ 1 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GT 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs LT 0.25
fuel/pump-right-on EQ 1 propulsion/tank[1]/contents-lbs GT 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs LT 0.25 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 1
/controls/fuel/tank[2]/pump-right EQ 1 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GT 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs LT 0.25 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 1

switch.name: fuel/right-pipe-feed
switch.test: fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs GT 0 propulsion/tank[4]/contents-lbs LT 0.25 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 1
/controls/fuel/tank[2]/pump-left EQ 1 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GT 0 propulsion/tank[4]/contents-lbs LT 0.25 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 1
fuel/pump-right-on EQ 1 propulsion/tank[1]/contents-lbs GT 0 propulsion/tank[4]/contents-lbs LT 0.25
/controls/fuel/tank[2]/pump-right EQ 1 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GT 0 propulsion/tank[4]/contents-lbs LT 0.25

switch.name: fuel/from-tank0-to-tank3
switch.test: fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-left-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-on EQ 0 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 0
fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-left-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-on EQ 0 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 1
fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-left-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-on EQ 1 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 0
fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-left-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-center-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-right-on EQ 0 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 0
fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-left-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-center-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-right-on EQ 1 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 0
fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-left-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-on EQ 1 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 1

switch.name: fuel/from-tank1-to-tank3
switch.test: fuel/pump-left-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-left-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-on EQ 1 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 1
fuel/pump-left-on EQ 1 fuel/pump-left-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-center-on EQ 0 fuel/pump-right-on EQ 1 /controls/fuel/crossfeed EQ 1
